text: nirakarippavarkalai narakattinmun kontuvarappatum nalil (avarkalai nokki,) ‘‘itu unmaiyallava? (Enru ketkappatum.) Atarku avarkal enillai! ‘‘Enkal iraivan mitu cattiyamaka! Unmaitan'' enru kuruvarkal. (Atarkavarkalai nokki) ‘‘ninkal itai nirakarittatan karanamaka itan vetanaiyai anupavittuk kontirunkal'' enru kuruvan
